info.title: Oneflow
info.description: Be more effective with truly digital contracts that make work faster, and life easier. Automate your contract management process with Oneflow

post.description: Register a webhook for a specified contract update event

items.description: Select event that will trigger this flow.

template_group_id.description: (Optional) Filter contracts by a template group.

parameters.name: webhookId
parameters.description: ID of the Webhook being deleted

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Contract Id

parameters.name: x-oneflow-user-email-override
parameters.description: Select user to execute this action as, or enter a custom email

parameters.name: participant_type
parameters.description: Individual/Company

parameters.name: signing_order
parameters.description: Sign order of participant

post.description: Add attachment or a  PDF document to a contract.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Contract Id

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content-Type

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: File to upload. File name should be in file.ext format

parameters.name: upload_as
parameters.description: select type of attachment to upload

parameters.name: x-oneflow-user-email-override
parameters.description: Select user to execute this action as, or enter a custom email

get.description: Retrieve a specific contract file by its ID.

parameters.name: x-oneflow-user-email-override
parameters.description: Select user to execute this action as, or enter a custom email

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Contract Id

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: Type of file: * 1 - Contract PDF * 2 - Verification

put.description: Update a datafield in the specific contract by its ID.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Contract Id

parameters.name: data_field_id
parameters.description: Custom id (external key) of the datafield.

parameters.name: x-oneflow-user-email-override
parameters.description: Select user to execute this action as, or enter a custom email

get.description: Retrieve the details of a contract by its ID.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Contract Id

delete.description: Delete a specific contract by its ID.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Contract Id

parameters.name: x-oneflow-user-email-override
parameters.description: Select user to execute this action as, or enter a custom email

get.summary: Get the status of a contract
get.description: Retrieve the status of a specific contract by its ID.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Contract Id

post.description: Sends contract to participants for signing.

parameters.name: contract_id
parameters.description: Contract Id

parameters.name: x-oneflow-user-email-override
parameters.description: Select user to execute this action as, or enter a custom email

post.description: Create a new contract based on the selected template.

parameters.name: x-oneflow-user-email
parameters.description: Specify Oneflow user email. Action will create contract as this user.

get.description: Retrieve the list of workspaces available for the specified user.
Retrieve the template type by template id.
Retrieve the template type by template id.
Use this endpoint to check if the Oneflow API is available.
Get a list of templates for a specified workspace.

post.description: Add a product to an existing product group in a contract.

parameters.name: x-ms-oneflow-contract_id
parameters.description: Contract Id

parameters.name: x-ms-oneflow-product-group-index
parameters.description: Select the product table index to add the products to. Ordered from top to bottom in the contract.

workspace_id.description: Select a Workspace for your contract

template_id.description: Select a template to create your contract from

preferred.x-ms-summary: Is Preferred Two Step Authentication Method

required_participant_attributes.x-ms-summary: Required Participant Attributes (Two Step Authentication Method)

has_passed_notice_period_start_time.x-ms-summary: Has notice period start time passed?

sign_state_updated_time.x-ms-summary: Individual participant sign state updated time

counterparty_lock.description: Select whether you want the product attributes to be editable by counterparties.

discount_percent.description: Discount as a percentage of the base amount.

amount.description: Secondary price value. i.e. if the product has a subscription fee.
Secondary discount amount as a number.

discount_percent.description: Secondary discount amount as a percentage of Price 2.

amount.description: Any positive number or 1/0 if the type is multiple_choice/single_choice

type.description: Select an input type of quantity (i.e. a checkbox, number, single select).

value.description: Value to set for the datafield.
